Supporting Merchandise Planning Manager in the monthly execution of Accessories Open to Buy
Supporting execution of category level hindsight reports for Accessories
Supporting the management and coordination of Markdown analysis & execution
Maintaining key item forecasts through sales plans, receipt flow and intake phasing
Building and maintaining relationships with relevant stakeholders, internal and external functions as well as global teams
Supporting the build out of NAM planning team processes’, tools, and reporting
Support ad-hoc requests from both planning leadership and merchandising counterparts
Supporting planning team in OTB forecasting on a monthly basis
Supporting planning team in pre-season budgeting
Delivering defined reports for strategic business initiatives or internal requests as needed
